column2: Primarily, because of the environmental impact as the water in Barcelona is drinkable but people prefer to buy bottled water. When we realized we preferred that too, we decided to get reusable water bottles to minimize our impact on environment. The type we have also keeps water cold/hot as a thermos, so it is also convenient for us during both winter and summer months.
column8: Definitely, yes to thermos so it keeps water at constant temperature. Otherwise, no other preference. Size wise, we have a few different sizes and that is also handy depending on where we are taking them.
column10: It is a little bit hard to clean, so i would suggest the cleaning part can be improved

column8: Specially mold. Sometimes materials are not mold proof
